column5: I will be down fishing the keys April 27th- May 3rd.. if any OFNers are down that way and want to hook up let me know. We have a nice cottage booked and plan on fishing like mad for 6 days...
If it was one week earlier....... 6 days of fishing has to have some good pictures...
yup! plan to have some tarpon and big Azz sharks!

You ought to give the Redneck Riviera a try sometime CH, Gulf Shores is a nice laid-back town with great Gulf of Mexico fishin'. The end of April is the opening of Red Snapper season!!!  ... get yer arms pulled outta the socket on an AJ hole... give me all the Groupers you catch with the yaller around their mouth (they're highly poisonous to Northerners yanno)... big Bull Reds...

I will ship all grouper to you! I am not much of a bottom fishing fan but do like a few for the grill!  I am going to try and land a darn tarpon.. they have had the best of me and I would like to change it  after that, off to catch the big toothy ones!
I'll be down in Dunedin first 2 weeks of April.  Hopefully get some shore fishing done for some redfish, sea trout and maybe if I'm lucky enough a few jacks and pomps.
